website_summaries.verdict: A durable lock, but it lacks the reliability you would expect for the higher price. Unless you need the long shackle, we recommend the Set-Your-Own model instead.
pros: Versatile 2 1/4-inch shackle and solid brass construction
cons: The numbers are small and hard to read
It's a bit stiff to turn and sometimes fails to work

customer_reviews.title: Shiny new Master Lock 175LH literally just broke after I took it out of the package. Sheesh.
customer_reviews.text: Shiny new Master Lock 175LH literally just broke after I took it out of the package. Sheesh. I opened the box. Zero'd out the dials with the default combination. Pushed the shackle in to disengage the lock and pulled up to open the shackle. The shackle just completely came off the base of the lock. I felt like the HULK. Seriously, this does not give me much confidence in the quality of new Master Locks on the market. I uploaded a few pics of my shiny new and broken Master Lock 175LH. FAIL.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lai

customer_reviews.title: Working as a gate lock
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lock for our back yard gate latch that was thin enough to fit through the available lock hole, long enough to be able to manipulate easily for unlocking, and that used a settable combo to avoid having to deal with a key. This lock met all of those criteria. The combo was easy to set and the lock seems sturdy (it's on the inside of our fence, though, so I didn't need anything too beefy).
customer_reviews.author: David Ravetti

customer_reviews.title: Last one lasted a long time used outdoors and on the road
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these I used on my trailer hitch for years. One day, it just wouldn't come off so I cut it. Like I said, though, it had been on there, out in the weather, for a long time--maybe 15 years. I ended up buying the same one because I love having the combination so I can easily let friends borrow the trailer knowing the combination but most barrel-shaped ones I've tried don't fit or awkwardly fit the hitch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Weather resistant and long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Master 175 combination locks in various outdoor applications for the last 20 years. They last well in outdoor applications, particularly if oiled occasionally. The combination is easy to change with the included key and instructions. The hasp can be cut with a sufficiently large bolt cutter but not easily with anything less than that.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky Peterson

customer_reviews.title: No batteries
customer_reviews.text: At my CCW class, the instructor was promoting a Biometric Lock for your gun case, for quick access to your weapon. The lock was cool and worked great. My concern was that you needed to have your bluetooth phone with you and the battery in the lock needed to be sufficiently charged. This lock doesn't have batteries, need your phone present and can be opened quickly if you set it in a way you only have to move one tumbler to open it.
customer_reviews.author: stan kaiser

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, look and feel. The ability to set one's own combination was necessary and it works very well. The long shank allows for easy viewing as our padlock is at waist level and the length allows the combination numbers on the bottom to be seen easier.
customer_reviews.author: GKMiyake

customer_reviews.title: Good locks.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these locks and they arrived very quickly. They seem well-made with a substantial weight. One of the locks had scratches on one side, but it didn't affect the functionality. The combination is easy to reset, but the reset tool is tiny and could easily be misplaced. So far I like the long shackle for the fence gate more than the short lock that I'm replacing. Of course, the new locks have not been left outdoors for long. I will update this review once I have had it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: C. G

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: The numbers started free spinning within a week. The lock still worked but was difficult to put the code into. Contacted masterlock and a replacement was sent right away. Their customer service is good. Not sure about the locks now.
customer_reviews.author: BionicMadness

customer_reviews.title: large loop
customer_reviews.text: hard to break with two opened end wrenches technique because the loop is too large . the painted numbers wore off the last one after two years of daily use . so with bad eyes needed a new lock . not the tuff est but pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Kat & Bear

customer_reviews.title: Should really answer this ten years from now, but ....
customer_reviews.text: Should really answer this ten years from now, but currently it is everything I expected - it was easy to set the combination and the numbers scroll back and forth pretty well. It feels heavy, as if it's solid and well made. BUT, I've had less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mason L Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This lock stopped working after a few months and it was impossible to lock it or reset the combination. The reset key bent and broke. The lock looks sturdy, but something is wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lovesbooks

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good idea at the time.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. I bought 2 of these to use on the back of my trailer. After only 2 months of use they are difficult to open and close, no big deal, just squirt some wd40 in and open them a few times right? Wrong. I did that and now one of them won't close at all and the other won't stay locked.
customer_reviews.author: jmac

customer_reviews.title: happy with this lock
customer_reviews.text: Felt lighter duty than the older version. Still good, just doesn't have that weighty feel of the old school locks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, solid lock
customer_reviews.text: Works great and as intended. Lock opening and closing is smooth and changing the combination was easy
customer_reviews.author: N. Luong

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as being for outdoor use. Didn't last 2 months before the tumbler mechanism became useless with very light use (exposed to the elements with 3-4 episodes of rain and probably unlocked 1-2/week.). Total waste of time and money. Unfortunately, there aren't a lot of good options for outdoor locks on Amazon, but don't waste your time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible code setting key
customer_reviews.text: The key could be a bit better. If not perfectly inserted it twists and bends. I was able to set the code without too much trouble though. Other than the crappy stamped steel key it would have been 5.
customer_reviews.author: S. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very good locks. We use these locks on gates for hunting club. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great lock.  Weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our fence gate. Had held up to all sorts of weather.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: The longer lock makes it more versatile for different uses ...
customer_reviews.text: The longer lock makes it more versatile for different uses. Some of my gates require the longer lock in order to fit the gate opener. Importantly, the lock can be programed by the owner to set the correct number sequence / pass-code for opening.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Solid security
customer_reviews.text: We took two of these on a round-the-world trip for locking luggage to immovable objects. (We did this in combination with the cable portion of bike locks that we already owned so we could loop the cable through a couple of suitcases and then use this lock to secure it all.) These are heavy to carry, but that heaviness also translates into solid security, so it was worth it. Setting the custom combination was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Charley Cross

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the trouble- DON'T BUY THIS!!! This was just delivered. I worked with this for 20 minutes. Sometimes it locks, sometimes it does not. When placed in a wrong combination it often takes 5-6 attempts before it will securely lock. The combination numbers are very hard to work with as well. Poor quality!! Sending it back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Grant

customer_reviews.title: These locks have been excellent for us to use over the last 13 yrs
customer_reviews.text: These locks have been excellent for us to use over the last 13 yrs. Some of these locks are still in use from 13 years ago. I just ordered 12 more as we have no problems with these locks. If they are used outside we recommend using spray silicone to keep them working properly for as long as we have used them. (ours get sprayed about 4 times per year)
customer_reviews.author: rblilly361

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Works on my camping trailer. Replaces a $50 lock and do not need a key
customer_reviews.author: Paul Garwood

customer_reviews.title: Great lock.
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy, and easy to use. I often use one hand to open.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Won't open
customer_reviews.text: Combo was not set to 0000 when I received it, so I could never open it. Return charge plus shipping would cost more than the $20 it cost to buy. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: YJ

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions exactly. After I set the lock to combination by the instructions, I tried it out and it is not working. Normally, I would think this is "user error" but I have used combination locks for years. I was very disappointed it is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Wellborn

customer_reviews.title: I have old ones that are really nice and work great but the last too I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Must be made in China now, I have old ones that are really nice and work great but the last too I purchased are junk. Stiff difficult to unlock and cheap and nasty feel to the combo wheels. One is so bad I wont use it for fear it doesn't open. Shame on them
customer_reviews.author: Boater

customer_reviews.title: test of time
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable product. We switched to the master lock that is "frost resistant" but those just broke down and we switched back to these. they are so durable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Locks arrived as expected. I will follow up in ...
customer_reviews.text: Locks arrived as expected. I will follow up in a couple of months regarding their exposure to sun and warm weather. I am hoping they have less corrosion. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Works for Yeti cooler
customer_reviews.text: Works wellfor my yeti. Just flip them over so the pad is facing upwards and its easier to see the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: One of the biggest problems with purchasing a lock on ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the biggest problems with purchasing a lock on line is the lack of an accurate description as to shackle dimensions. Not the case here. As described.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fajoni, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the longer bolt. Tumblers stick and are somewhat difficult to set and open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it apparently is not good - as it is more easily cut
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered on time, and works very well. The only caution I would give on this product, which I didn't realize until after purchase is, although the long needle is helpful in use, it apparently is not good - as it is more easily cut, or broken. In this regard, and from a safety perspective, it may be wise to get a shorter needle.
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: your combination also a heavy lock which is a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for easy to change the combination to customize it to your combination also a heavy lock which is a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to work on any roto molded cooler to help ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to work on any roto molded cooler to help keep items bear proof or to lock it down to your truck using a cable!
customer_reviews.author: Philip, San Jose CA

customer_reviews.title: Great lock and I like the feature how you can change the combination.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought at least six of these locks over the years. There are great locks and hold up well. You can change the combination to any four numbers ... that is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: PatO2098

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have Pelican cases that require a lock with an extended shackle. I also don't like having to keep track of keys for padlocks. This programable padlock with an extended shackle was perfect for these cases.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holliday 52

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly the first time. Easy to set the combination.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: Great locks! Set the combo once and never look back. Use them for a gun case.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for thick tool cases that won't take a smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Perfect for thick tool cases that won't take a smaller lock. Setting the lock took just a few minutes, and we've been using it since, with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These locks hold up to daily use for a lot longer than I'd expect them to.
customer_reviews.author: J.W. Green

customer_reviews.title: These are a great lock for any cooler.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our Yeti. We have more keys then a Janitor for our RV. We didn't need another set of keys. These combination locks worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I also have the smaller version. Tough locks. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS LOCK! Haven’t even had a month and it’s already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working well and easy to use, arrived on time. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: The Glens

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Discribed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set your own number combination and very sturdy, heavy duty. Good brand with Master.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guru

customer_reviews.title: Master Lock
customer_reviews.text: Good Master lock. You can reset the combo to any 4 digit set you like.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Durante

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not good for outdoors, the numbers in the bottom are practically illegible, not practical at all
customer_reviews.author: G. Colon

customer_reviews.title: Masterful fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that is just the right length locking bar for the chain style used to lock a gate.
customer_reviews.author: Pearlyharbor

customer_reviews.title: Great LOCK
customer_reviews.text: great lock. easy to use. stong. weather prroof. have 3.
customer_reviews.author: G W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: direct replacement for a trailer that is accessed by several folks
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent locks, I have a few different shank sizes of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. Strong and dependable. decently priced! Wish the numbers were a little bigger, but I will do its job. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Keyless in Sacramento
customer_reviews.text: No more pesky keys. Open says a'me. Great convenience and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Scott

customer_reviews.title: Quality you can count on.
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid construction. Easy to set combination. A bit pricy.
customer_reviews.author: MarginCall

customer_reviews.title: I have several of these with the shorter shank, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these with the shorter shank, and they have all performed well. This one, so far, works equally as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crossword

customer_reviews.title: Lock-it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set. Works good after months of use and rain.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Quality lock for price. Numbers are a little hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality lock for price. Numbers are a little hard to see in low light situations however given the gold on gold.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So far I like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this product a lot. We'll see how it holds up but I am optimistic from what I have seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hannan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, pretty simple. Wish the rekey method was easier without having the actual special key.
customer_reviews.author: AndyTheFiredog

customer_reviews.title: They're easy to setup and work well
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these. They're easy to setup and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gill

customer_reviews.title: The long shackle is perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed versatile lock. You can change the combination any time you wish. The long shackle is perfect for my application.
customer_reviews.author: seventyplus

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when you set the combination.
customer_reviews.text: One of the two locks failed to properly set to its new combination and cannot be reopened. I've set dozens of these locks and this never happened. Will have to return and replace.
customer_reviews.author: DanO

customer_reviews.title: I was in my barn last night and it opened and closed fine. Tonight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on 3/4/2017 on an amazon deal. Today, 4/24/17, the combination no longer worked as the lock was on my barn. I was in my barn last night and it opened and closed fine. Tonight, the combination would not work. Amazon deal was a way for master lock to get rid of a defective product. Will never buy Master Lock combination products again.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: tough lock that I don't need a key for, awesome
customer_reviews.author: JAW

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock
customer_reviews.text: Use at the gym -I like the option to set your own combination and is well made. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: copperheadharley

customer_reviews.title: easy turn tumblers and setting of the combination
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, easy turn tumblers and setting of the combination. I am using these so I stop loosing keys and the kids can access areas they need as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was 10 bucks less than my local locksmith wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Phil McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer hitch lock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on a trailer hitch and it works great. The light cable and break a way cable fit in the lock as well to keep them from dragging.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: The lock was everything I ordered and more.. ...
customer_reviews.text: The lock was everything I ordered and more...it arrived two days earlier than expected and that was so appreciated! Thank you. Ron Gilbert
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this one
customer_reviews.text: It is cheaply made. the numbers are tiny and do not roll easily and I am afraid it will fail . it is hard to turn them, need to use your finger nail. Not at all what I expected from Master Lock. would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it a master lock works like a master lock should.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are hard to find will order more, ,beats looking for a key
customer_reviews.author: Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great price and a great product...fast shipping...I recommend very highly. I installed mine immediately upon receiving. now all gates are secure.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K. Bernet

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for a site gate
customer_reviews.text: I use this lock for the main gate at a large residential construction project that I manage. the code allows us to let subcontractors access the site when we are offsite, and the lock is really solid. has worked well for 8 months so far and expect it to work for years to come. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kachmar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our camper
customer_reviews.text: This lock works great to put on the tounge of our camper to prevent stealing. The shank fits perfectly and very convenient with combination lock instead of keys
customer_reviews.author: Leif J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remember how to open
customer_reviews.text: This lock works great and is easy to open. It is easy to remember how to open the combination lock.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne King

customer_reviews.title: I used for the first time yesterday and was frustrated and disappointed. The lock combination is hard to read and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the locker when I go to the gym. I used for the first time yesterday and was frustrated and disappointed. The lock combination is hard to read and the turning the combination was stiff and difficult. It took me some time to get it open and I resolved that I would never use it again. So I'm still looking for a good combination lock.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent A. Franco

customer_reviews.title: I like this product for my
customer_reviews.text: could not find anywhere else, I like this product for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good Lock.
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 gates and having the same combo is great. Does what I need it to do. Would happily by another.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie G

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for nuclear missle launch code security.
customer_reviews.text: These are good locks. I was a nuclear missile launch officer. We used these locks to secure the encrypted launch codes in a red metal box. Both crew members had their lock on the box.
customer_reviews.author: JimTid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and able to set my own combo...Great product. No issues
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The combination wheels did not lock. They were spinning without resistance and did not align correctly to lock.

customer_reviews.title: Product shows quality and precision
customer_reviews.text: Lock works great, with excellent appearance as a quality, precision product, which improves its deterrence effect.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Manetti

customer_reviews.title: I received the package to day and it had never ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the package to day and it had never been sealed. The package was open and it was short one lock.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok as the design and the padlock is suitable what we would like to buy although there is some disadvantage.

product_meta.title: Master Lock 175LH Set Your Own Combination Padlock, 2-1/4 in. Shackle, Brass Finish
feature_bullets: Indoor and outdoor lock is best used as a gate lock or shed lock for protection and security from theft; extra long shackle for application flexibility
Set your own four digit combination lock for easy combination recall; combination change tool included
Combo lock is constructed with a solid body for strength and weatherability, hardened steel shackle for cut resistance
2 in. (51mm) wide lock body; 5/16 in. (8mm) diameter shackle with 2-1/4 in. (57mm) length, 1 in. (25mm) width
Shackle is preset to open on 0-0-0-0; see user manual for combination reset instructions
